website_summaries.verdict: This is a comprehensive collection of 150+ crayons from the most recognized brand in the industry.
pros: Contains 152 crayon colors, including glitter and metallics
Set includes durable carrying case and sharpener
Crayons are double wrapped for additional strength
cons: Some reports of broken or missing crayons on arrival
Case may not hold all crayons securely

customer_reviews.title: NOT CRAYOLA QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: Another damaged box from Amazon. Every delivery lately holds a torn or smashed box. As these are gifts, I’m not real happy, especially when you’re paying $10 for crayons. The quality of the crayons are not up to Crayola standards, very waxy, and just disappointing. It’s very embarrassing to give a gift that has a torn box and poor quality. I recommend not purchasing. And what’s with all the damaged product, Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Frances Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Awful packaging, missing crayons
customer_reviews.text: Was not pleased at all with how this product came in the box. Crayons are crayons and they still work, etc but definitely going to be a hassle to try and put back together to give as a xmas present. Hope none are broken or missing **update: finally went through and put all crayons back. 1 broken, 8 missing and 1 chewed piece of gum in the box. I will be returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Jorie

customer_reviews.title: A great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety! I have 151colours. I got 2 white, but that's fine as I use the White for blending. There is glittery colour, metallic colours, neons as well as a great range of other colours. I love been creative with this set.
customer_reviews.author: R Soper

customer_reviews.title: Be creative, guys! Don't give flowers! Give crayons!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Crayola's biggest box of crayons as a surprise for my wife's birthday. Weeks later while recounting what a wonderful, supportive husband I am, she finished: "... and you bought me CRAYONS!" Diamonds may be a woman's best friend, but crayons bring out the girl inside.
customer_reviews.author: Leland

customer_reviews.title: Nice container... Crayons broken.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so our school crayons would be contained as I homeschool my three children. I gave it three stars because it does serve that purpose well. However, I have not been impressed with the quality of the crayons that came with it. As of today, we have found 15 crayons that have had to be re sharpened because they were broken just below the edge of the wrapper. This is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3Loves

customer_reviews.title: Received used crayons
customer_reviews.text: I just received this - and it is clearly a return. The package was taped with scotch tape closed. There is a crayon missing and a used crayon. I am disappointed with this purchase as it was supposed to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact case but was disappointed that some of the crayons were broken when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: CARRIE HERWEYER

customer_reviews.title: Missing Crayons
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and gave it as a Christmas gift. When they opened it a section of crayons, of course the area hid by the packaging, was missing. Very disappointed considering it was suppose to be new and untampered.
customer_reviews.author: ZAW

customer_reviews.title: Biggest crayon set online!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this at first because a few comments said the crayons arrived broken, but mine arrived in great condition! Here are a few good things about these crayons: -There are 152 individual colors in 4 themes (metallic, neon, glitter, normal) -Comes in cute compact case -Includes crayon sharpener -Nice price!!!! -Shipped in 2 days, so fast! I am gonna buy a bunch of these this Christmas for my nephews and neices, but for now, I am happy to have these for my own coloring books! It really is a great gift for artists of any age who use crayons. 5 stars, for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.G.CortesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love the green holder
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself. I like doing art projects. I love different type of mediums, colored pencils, markers, gel pens, paint, pastels and yes even crayons. I love crayons there are so many ways to use them when creating. I love that this set has a way to keep them organized. My holder was green and not yellow as shown in the pictures. I love green so this made my day. I like the plastic packaging that was in the box to keep the crayons in place while shipping. I'm keeping it to use as a cover to keep dust and glitter out when not in use. All the crayons were whole non broken. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PuddzeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Who Doesn't Love Crayola?
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure someone, somewhere doesn't, because....people. Am I right? The point is, the crayons I buy today are the same quality Binney & Smith are known for since I was eating them and shoving them up my nose in kindergarten. I use them for wax seal stamps, rather than paying the ridiculous $1 and up for crayon-sized sealing wax "candles", an idea that also affords me a choice of 152 beautiful colors by which to match my stationery. Yay! Order fulfillment and shipping were likewise stellar. I got what I ordered, when it was expected to be delivered. I'd have to look really hard to find a single thing wrong with any part of my experience with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Phillis Nix

customer_reviews.title: I made the mistake of opening the crayon box when ...
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of opening the crayon box when back to school and it's missing a crayon sleeve :(
customer_reviews.author: jbear

customer_reviews.title: Broken tips
customer_reviews.text: Please be aware that dozens and dozens of these crayons were broken when they arrived. Totally useless as a gift as well as using the broken crayons....really???
customer_reviews.author: philly willy

customer_reviews.title: Love this monster box of colors.
customer_reviews.text: I gave away my original crayons to an ailing friend along with an adult coloring book. Last week I wanted to paint with crayons but no crayons! I saw this set and ordered it. Wow. Love it. And the painting I did of a pear looks like oil. Colors are marvelous. There are also metallic and glitter colors. May I make a suggestion to the manufacturer? Please package these according to hue/color. I spent a good half hour sorting these....but then I am a Virgo! Also need two whites and two blacks. I showed this off to my weekly all-media art class.
customer_reviews.author: Cavell

customer_reviews.title: I will be buying more of these
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with all crayons in tact. No breaks, fractures, or missing crayons. There were also no duplicates. I recommend people look for subtle differences in the glitter/metallic colors. These crayons impressed a group of 10-11 year old girls. These eagle-eyed young ladies verified the color differences, correct number, and unlike markers - none were dried upon arrival! I don’t enjoy coloring but love crayons. I was concerned based on reviews that highlighted poor packaging and broken crayons. These arrived in a box with airbags. They were sent via UPS therefore went to my alternate pick-up location. They were treated well by their handlers.
customer_reviews.author: JVM123

customer_reviews.title: Don't smell very good
customer_reviews.text: I think having 152 crayons in a nice plastic caddy with a crayon sharpener is really great. That's a wonderful assortment of colors. But the crayons smell a little strange, which I don't much like, not like the crayons of yesteryear. And they don't adhere to the paper the way I remember from long ago. The effect is rather mottled, which is fine, but not what I expected. Also, the colored wax (which is what crayons are) flecks off onto the paper, so that's sort of a small nuisance. So those are the reasons why I gave an overall three star rating.
customer_reviews.author: 3skylavender

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. I think I have more fun coloring than my daughter. I never had this many options growing up. The stardard for us was red, orange, yellow, green, brown, purple. It is a great set to have for any child. Watching my daughter explore new colors and create drawings is the best part. The sharpener is very convenient. The crayons produce beautiful bright colors. This is a authentic crayola product. I recommend to any child or adult that loves to color go buy this set.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: So many crayons!
customer_reviews.text: ALL OF THE CRAYONS! I’m in my 20’s so I thought I was beyond over crayons, but this is so cool. They come in a neat display case that organizes all the crayons, so you aren’t left with a bunch of boxes all over the place at the end of the day, and there are more than enough variations of different colors, so multiple people can be drawing and not have to wait for someone to be done with a color that they need. There are a lot of colors that I had to look up the names of, as I’ve never heard of them before.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A lil girls dream crayons....
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase. My granddaughter loves everything about these and her favorites are the glitter crayons. These also have held up in general use so far and I’m hoping they last thru the summer. The reason for the second purchase is she love them so much the reason for the second purchases she love them so much she wanted to share them with her little sister and not only have a carry-on of crayons at home but a carrier crayons at daddy'sThe reason for the second purchase is she loves them so much she wanted to share them with her little sister and not only have a caddy of crayons at home but a caddy of crayons at daddy’s.
customer_reviews.author: Thatgirlsatx

customer_reviews.title: Broken crayons on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Crayons are crayons but this package came with 1/4 of the tips of them broken off i kept It cuz i needed Them at the time - buyer be ware!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rudbeck

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: What happened to reliable Crayola crayons? These are a mess. There is no continuation of color, the crayons leave streaks on the paper. Also have slivers of wax that bunch up on the end of the crayon and then transfer to your page so that you have to constantly wipe the page to remove it. I've been a Crayola lover for 60 years and never been so disappointed in a favorite product as I am with these. The colored pencils were not good quality either so Crayola, this is where we say goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Seckinger

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. The outer box was in perfect condition but when opened an entire side of the crayons were either crushed or broken in the middle or the bottoms were snapped off. It was obvious that the product was damaged before boxed in the outer container and shipped anyways. 😕
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, sturdy caddy.
customer_reviews.text: A trusted brand, I purchased this set initially for the littles. After sorting through the beautiful colors, I'm keeping this set for myself! I will order another set for my babes. Not only are the assorted colors nice, the caddy is sturdy and keeps the crayons organized. There's no need to purchase yet another box for storage. The old ones are regular pencil boxes and the littles and I often dig through a few boxes for specific colors. With this upright, organized box, I'm hoping this will make coloring much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Poma

customer_reviews.title: So many colors to choose from...
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to get this and was especially excited to see that it had "Dandelion"! It also had glitter & metallic crayons. Even at only six years old, he already recognizes that Crayola crayons work better than other crayons and is picky about which crayons he will use. Only complaint was that there was not a more permanent lid. There is just a flimsy plastic piece used for packing that sits on top.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Mama &Papa

customer_reviews.title: My grandkids will like this.  Me, I'm not so sure...
customer_reviews.text: The case these crayons come in feels sturdy enough. And while it doesn't have an actuaal lid, there's a sort of "dust cover," which is better than nothing. My grandkids will enjoy them, I'm sure. But what I'm not truly excited about is the color selection - there is a disproportionate amount of very dark colors. And there is NO rhyme or reason to how they're arranged. The array is a little confusing and uninspiring.
customer_reviews.author: S. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used and broken.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived used. Missing and broken crayons. Lid covered in crayon and dirt marks. Broken off crayon inside of crayon sharpener. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One can enjoy coloring for sure!
customer_reviews.text: CRAYONS!!! As an adult I love this! 152 crayons, multiple colors, glitter colors, metallic colors, new colors! It's great, the carrier is easy even for my adult fingers, NONE of my crayons were broken, no tips were chipped, no cracks, no duplicate colors but there are regular colors that also come in glitter I myself don't consider those the same color but to each their own. This kit is perfect for me, easy to use and put away. Its so perfect I haven't used them yet and I've had them over a week now lol
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Great set and price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these crayons. Apparently has every color a 7 year old would need (ie: neon, glitter, novel colors). She loves the caddy and the names of all the colors. Bonus is the sharpener that is included. It is small enough that she can take it to school and place it on her desk. Amazon had the best price so purchased it here ($10 vs. Michaels,etc). Was slightly concerned that they would come damaged- but came totally intact. Would be a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: SYK

customer_reviews.title: DEFINITELY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love crayola brand. They color smoothly and you can always melt down the little pieces you would normally throw away and create a new crayon. When I saw this ultimate crayon collection with carry case and all I was so happy, especially with the price, and I knew my daughter would LOVE it. She does by the way. Lol I think there was only one crayon that had a slightly broken tip but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Allie's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Crayola quality has greatly decreased :(
customer_reviews.text: What happened to you Crayola? We feel like we are coloring with Rose Art or other discount crayons. Colors are dull and leave a lot of tiny wax pieces on the page. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Crayolas are the ONLY Crayon to Own
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had another brand of crayons--they were terrible: waxy, you had to press really hard, and they didn't really put color on the paper. Crayolas are the best. He's only age 3, but he noticed the difference immediately in how much color went onto the paper and that you can "shade" things! The crayons come in a wonderful carrying case that includes a sharpener. If you aren't using Crayola, you aren't really coloring.
customer_reviews.author: J Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Crayons for the Kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friends daughter, and she ABSOLUTELY loves them! She says she has never had so many crayons in her LIFE (shes 4, lol) But so far so good, she is making good use of each color, and I am very satisfied with my purchase. Kids will absolutely love this, and the sharpener works very well, but I could imagine if used enough it can become gummed up, so id just try to clean it on occasion. Aside from that, from a 4yr old point of view, this item is VERY much appreciated. :)
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Scott

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gift and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our whole family at Christmas and it is a big hit! We leave this in the center of our table and it is used consistently every day by both parents, teens and little kids. Who doesn't love a box of crayons-and even better all the crayons you can get with a sharpener and all in a nice box?
customer_reviews.author: Cee Marie

customer_reviews.title: So many colors! Love this box!
customer_reviews.text: So many awesome colors and all in one convenient box. I love the shape of the box. We leave it on the table in the playroom at all times so we’re always ready for whatever project comes our way. The only thing I would change is the lid. We didn’t throw it away, but it appears that it is meant to be disposable. It would be nice if it matched the quality of the rest of the box. This is still an excellent set of crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Stenogirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product for all ages that can handle the regular sized crayons. (not the larger ones for younger children). I bought 1 set at a craft store and the 2nd one at Amazon. One set for 15-18 year old grandchildren and one set for me (age: 68) . . .152 different colors including some different textures and effects i.e. metallic and also another one. Excellent meditation tool with a fantastic coloring book. Check out coloring books too, search "coloring books"' and you will find excellent children's and adult's coloring books. So happy with everything about this set.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Color Selection
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these crayons! His eyes lit up when he opened them up for Christmas. They get used everyday for homework, and his artwork. There are great color choices (he loves the glitter and metallic ones!). The caddy and sharpener are also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Priss

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for kids
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this, I have 2 kids who are 8 and 5 and it has been so nice for them to have a place to put there crayons and keep them organized. My son did spill them all so they are not as organized as they were when we got this but I still would buy this product again. In fact I am going to buy one for my moms house so they can keep there crayons picked up when they are there visiting.
customer_reviews.author: Scotti

customer_reviews.title: So much more than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my children. They were so amazed that it had not only regular colors, but metallic, and glitter colors as well! The sharpener that is built in is such a huge bonus as well! Crayola is always our go to brand and always will be! I’ll be ordering this product again when we need more!
customer_reviews.author: Corlan and Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I got it for my job (not for my kids) and I like that it has all 120 of the crayola colors in it (which included 16 neon colors.) This set also has 32 glitter crayons to make the set a full 152. It also includes a crayon sharpener that has the shavings go into a box (like a pencil sharpener) so that it collects them instead of them getting everywhere. Great value for price.
customer_reviews.author: Angry Kitty Fashion Boutique

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 kids one is 3 now one is 6 and the other 11, they all love it . So many colors and variety also the metallic colors are awesome and my daughters favorites. Would recommend to anyone and the price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: LetsBeHonest

customer_reviews.title: A crayon of every color!
customer_reviews.text: Crayons just don't seem to be made as well as they used to. I bought Crayola as the generic crayons didn't seem to be as easy to lay on color for my 2 year old. Well, it's still not that easy for me with some of these colors. We had several crayons with broken tips. I wish that the "lid" were more of a permanent thing rather than a thin disposable plastic. Overall it's a great value for the money. Probably way more colors than anyone needs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: For me! Great organization.
customer_reviews.text: Don't laugh. I bought these for myself. I am coloring pictures for nursing homes. And for anything else I want to color. I love the organization. I've arranged the colors by grouping. There are alott of metallic options. Great selection of colors. And I enjoy reading all the new names. Great for kids who are old enough to take care of things.
customer_reviews.author: AngieSewTherapy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Our children LOVE this set! It is so handy when they are carrying the case around and makes the crayons very portable. The crayon sharpener is very convenient and the array of choices to color with is outstanding. I will buy these again when they need to be replaced as our kids love the variety and the glitter crayons. If you have a child who loves to color or is a budding artist, get these! My husband, over Christmas break with our children, was coloring with these crayons and remarked, "Wow! I can't believe how many crayons I have to pick from!" Truth. They arrived quickly with only 1 crayon breaking in-transit. Not bad!
customer_reviews.author: PiTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Wifey needs coloring time too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Box for my wife along with some coloring books to help her de-stress after a long day as a medical professional. She loves it!!!.. Her eyes lit up like a kid on christmas and now she kinda actually looks like a kid when i see her at her desk or on the bed with her colors spread around her. I actually had to tell her a couple times to not leave them lying about. I think i might need to get her a toy box soon...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good crayons, nice color assortment.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. They can be stored right in the little case they come in. My only problem was there was no sharpener & C.S. wanted me to return the entire set to get a pencil sharpener. I wasn't happy. I just went to staples & bought one. Other than that fluke, they're the best crayons & the colors are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on crayons!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best deal on crayons I have ever seen, especially as they are the iconic Crayola brand. The crayons come in the typical cardboard sleeves, but the sleeves sit perfectly inside a hard plastic, carousel-like container that makes it easy to see all of your crayons at any given time. The carousel swivels for easy selection and hours of fun. Plus, $12 for 152 crayons is a heck of a deal. You pay almost $10 for the 96 set. I purchased a few of these sets for my children and one for myself. Great deal and of course the quality of Crayola crayons is phenomenal compared to the off brands.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal crayon set! The price is right for the value you get! The crayons come nestled in a cute and very useful carousel, including a crayon sharpener in the middle. It has many variations of colors, and you aren’t sitting there questioning which one is which. They are easy to get to, and the caddy is easy to store. It got my young child excited about coloring!
customer_reviews.author: mssnoopy1976

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults alike. Awesome crayon box!
customer_reviews.text: My inner child is VERY spoiled. Lol! So, naturally, I had to get the biggest box of crayons that Crayola currently sells. These are great. They're 152 waxy sticks of pure stress-reducing joy. This box is totally giftable. It even comes with a crayon caddy and removable sharpener. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G

customer_reviews.title: So. Many. Colors!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old was hysterically happy when he opened these for his 2nd birthday. He LOVES coloring and we were a little tired of the same colors that are in the back to school packs. Oh my goodness, I couldnt believe the assortment of colors! Neons, glitter, metallic, and so many others! If you have a crayon fan in your house, this is a fantastic special occasion gift for them.
customer_reviews.author: Miller Family

customer_reviews.title: Hard case 152 different colors Crayola brand
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice! Of course you already know I only like Crayola crayons! I don't care what anyone says there is a difference! But I digress... they have a top that fits over them and they come in a green case that you can take out of the box I thought the green case was cardboard when I ordered them but it isn't it's a hard plastic so it won't get torn up and you can use it when you purchase new crayons after these are worn out and it has a big yellow crayon sharpener that sits inside the crayon holder! This is called the ultimate collection and it has 152 different colors!!!! So cool!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I love how the crayons are situated and of course you can situate them how you want to. I love that it included the recently removed, "Dandelion" crayon. This set of crayons also has a sharpener as well. I like the glitter crayons as they have a vivid color to them but the glitter does leave smudges behind, nothing a fingernail cant take care of though.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlyrav

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the longest crayons have lasted without breaking. My kids know they have to put crayons back exactly where they got them and only take one at a time. Much less mess and less broken crayons. And I love that it has a built in sharpener and it’s easy to carry. And my kids love the glitter crayons!
customer_reviews.author: Evelina K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I bought it for myself
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I bought it for myself, and I only wish I could have had it as a child! There's an incredible 152 colors, including shimmery ones. The only cons I've found is that it's a bit difficult to travel with, and there isn't a cover for it other than the flimsy plastic packaging it comes with. But for what it is, it's a great product, and it would make a great gift for a child or adult!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing colors
customer_reviews.text: Great value, nothing can compare, this is my second purchase for the same item, my boys were a little too young to handle this and most of them broke after they removed the papel. I also broke a few, I guest is inevitable, but still the box and the the possibility to keep them all together in the same place is very good, also is a great gift if you match it with a coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Duje-Camere

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors and many of them
customer_reviews.text: If you think there's enough crayons here for an army of small children. And you'd be correct! However, my artist in training is wearing these out quickly so there's not likely to be many "good" colors left. Drawing, coloring...large scale and small. There are dozens of colors, a really nice carrying case, and also a sharpener. The carrying case is a very solidly built heavy plastic, and the colors are true and bright. Neon, bright and sparkle colors work well and please any budding artist. Great fun for any child.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: I still love to color
customer_reviews.text: I admit it! I still love to color, love to create, and love to be imaginative. I ordered these crayons in order to allow myself time to just enjoy the simple things of life just as I did as a child! I plan on enjoying myself throughly with this set which has a enormous variety of hues, shades and plus during these long endless winter months I need something to occupy my mind and interest! U can never go wrong with a classic! Bravo 👏🏽 Crayola!!
customer_reviews.author: LOUISE “ LOU-LOU LANE-COTTON

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great. With an option of 152 crayons you have every color you can imagine. Crayola is the best quality crayon in my opionion they always have been my go to. This plastic case is really nice and holds the crayons nicely. The way it is designed and set up you can see all the colors with out having to dump anything out like in box. This comes with the ever so handy crayon sharpener as well. I would recommend the ultimate crayon collection to any kid or adult. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabatha

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Crayola Crayon Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Crayon collection to be used at a coloring station at our 3-year old's birthday party. The assortment is great and probably the best value for Crayon's I've purchased over the years. At this age, the Crayons did not stay in the carrier for long (it's a great Crayon holder with Crayon sharpener for older kids) so we're using the carrier to hold other items like pencils, scissors, etc. and all of the Crayons live in her Crayon bag. I was very impressed with this set.
customer_reviews.author: T. &  A. Newsome

customer_reviews.title: Best set we have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a flash sale and was very happy to see how it is packaged. My Grandson is at the age now that he is picky about how they go back in. This container is perfect for storage. There are also glitter colors included which are very cool. The sharpener is large so even the little kids can handle it. You can't beat Crayola!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Crandall

customer_reviews.title: Great crayon set
customer_reviews.text: Crayola makes the best crayons. Some other brands are not as easy to clean up if the children color furniture, walls etc. Also these crayons don't gum up sharpeners.
customer_reviews.author: dionisio

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for all these crayons and the holder. Lots of shades you won’t typically see in a box set. Didn’t realize it came with “glitter” crayons. Kids love those! The sharpener isn’t that good. Would be better if it has a circle swivel under it so it could rotate for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: None were broken!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid to order after reading so many horrible delivery stories. I took a chance and no broken crayons! The container the crayons are in is strudy; however, the top to the crayon container could be better. Its a flimsy plastic top and wont last. Overall happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great item for any age
customer_reviews.text: Lots of colors in easy to use carrying case. Great item for any age from children to adults who love to color
customer_reviews.author: Christy Schwanke

customer_reviews.title: Best set of crayons out there!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this big box of crayons! Wonderful variety of colors no redundancy. Sturdy plastic box with easy access to the crayons. I actually purchased for myself why not have nice crayons to use instead of the smaller paper boxes we usually buy the kids. I will be buying more of these as gifts they're a definite kid favorite and moms who doodle will enjoy them too
customer_reviews.author: KiraNyres

customer_reviews.title: A slave to Crayola.
customer_reviews.text: The crayons arrived in good condition and all, but can we talk about a larger problem...? These crayon collections just keep getting bigger and bigger? When will it end? I thought 120 was the end-all-be-all of colored wax, but then I saw this. What's next? 175? The worst part is...I'll probably buy that too.
customer_reviews.author: Tlisks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what i was looking for this is perfect!!!, so many nice and beautiful colors And at a very cheap and good price, Totally worth it! The colors arrived perfectly good no issue (all came in fully no broken or chipped colors) Im so glad i purchased these for my drawings!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids & grown-ups to carry.  Great selection of colors.  Love having a sharpener included!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself (to go with my new coloring book). Adults enjoy coloring, too! I believe this would be easy for little hands to carry around, as well as mine. Keeps everything nice & organized. Haven't seen anything this good, before now!
customer_reviews.author: MaryMartha

customer_reviews.title: They don’t knock anymore?
customer_reviews.text: I received my package in good condition in a nice little crayons case. Just wish I knew it had arrived as no one knocked on the door just left it and disappeared glad no one stole my package THIS TIME some amazon drivers just don’t care. But other then that everything else was fine truly happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Crafty
customer_reviews.text: First off, LOVE this carrying case of crayons. Functional, and great for kids and adults that like to doodle/color. The pencil sharpener in the center is a bonus that I didn't expect to like. It sharpens with a lip so that the crayon still looks new-ish. ** not so much a dislike, but a note the glitter crayons are blah. They color so/so and deposit glitter unevenly. Thankfully there is not many of those.
customer_reviews.author: Mpl

customer_reviews.title: Many colors do not transfer well
customer_reviews.text: Of the set we have, in my classroom, used all and discovered that many of the colors do not transfer well and so maybe half of the 152 -- maybe 50-70--actually have use. The rest of these crayons no matter how hard you press do not color the paper but leave trace color. I will go back to the marketplace for other crayon manufacturers. Crayons is hit or miss.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Zm

customer_reviews.title: Crayons on a Carousel
customer_reviews.text: I Love these! Different colors, may be some duplicates, but the crayons come in a box, on a tray. Top of the tray, is a crayon sharpener. I bought two of this item. You REALLY need the carousel. Mine was lost by someone and it was very difficult to see the colors, with the boxes lying down. So worth the price. BTW, keep the plastic over the crayons. When not in use. It protects the crayons from breaking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Torrance

customer_reviews.title: If you color, you need these!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging alone is worth it! But this is the most epic set of Crayolas I've ever owned. My inner 8 year-old is super thrilled. If loving this is wrong, I don't want to be right! (and if Crayola starts making a larger set, do not tell me).
customer_reviews.author: Ella Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this and I mean Loved this! Super amazing! I hope this last her a couple months, ya know kids lol.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: Awesome assortment of colors, the sharpener is a bit to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: This box of crayons give a large variety to choose from. There are even glitter crayons that add a new dimension to coloring. One of the reasons why I bought this set was the sharpener. It does work, however it is a bit tricky to use. It requires you to keep the crayon perfectly straight or the tip breaks off. Not really little kid friendly. That said the selection of different colors are great, just don't expect too much from the sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: AutoxSTI

customer_reviews.title: Every color you can think of, plus more
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 year old who loves to journal. He will write out what happened and then draw a picture of it. He was going through crayons and complained about not having enough to draw all the colors he had seen that day. When looking for crayons, I came across these. It has all the colors he will ever need, and they also have fun names. He didn't keep them in the provided case, he separated them out by color and placed them in separate pencil cases, i.e Reds, Greens, Yellow, etc. This is a great buy and I highly recommend to any parents of a budding artist (or journalist in my case)
customer_reviews.author: Gennatay.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 little siblings and they love art and drawing and painting and coloring so much. I bought them this for Christmas and they love bringing it all over the house and coloring in the dining room, bedroom, living room, etc. The handle is very helpful and the case is sturdy. Have had these for about a year and they're still using them. Love crayola!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Very practical!
customer_reviews.text: Very practical and fun to have. Keeps crayons very organized. 2 yo loves it. So many different colors. Best thing is I can always refill crayons once it breaks with other crayons crayons. Crayon sharpener is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: TTT83

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old and 8 year old. My daughter, the youngest loves it, she loves coloring and crafts. My son didn't seem as excited about it as my daughter, but he's not into drawing and coloring as much as she is. I like that it keeps all the crayons in one place, and they can easily find which color they are looking for without digging through our old tub of crayons and spilling them everywhere. Also makes clean up easy now that every crayon has it's on place, they use one and put it right back and grab another one. Feels like it's made out of nice plastic, not to flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for a desk!
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have a way to finally store crayons on a desk without having to have them in a bin! My toddler has an IKEA desk in her playroom for her art station and this works great! She even puts them back, not sure if this is a cleaning motivator, but she remembers not to leave them out! Very happy with the purchase, just took a while to receive since these were not on Prime.
customer_reviews.author: jsandvold

customer_reviews.title: Believe the kids will be thrilled with this big amazing box of crayons.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my neighbors grandkids. Their momo says the kids are going to love it. I guess their going back to school this week, so it’ll be awhile before the kids see it. I think they’ll flip myself!
customer_reviews.author: Mary H.  Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This caddy is great for the kids. They have regular crayons, crayons with glitter...so many options! We use it at our store in a kids corner and it has held up through hundreds of kids and is easy to wipe down and keep organized! I have recommended this to many a parent over the last year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids adore this! It keeps it simple when storing the crayons! I love the sharpener and that it’s not attached to the box and can be held! The ONLY downfall is that there isn’t a black crayon.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Great crayons that do not break easily. This ultimate collection comes with so many colors and some metallic and glitter colors as well. Not only do me and girls love coloring with these crayons but we also love reading the colors.
customer_reviews.author: QueenNesha

customer_reviews.title: Good crayon holder, needs better lid
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this caddy holds the sleeves from the regular 64 count boxes, that way I can easily replace them. The sharpener works well also. I wish that it came with a snap in lid. My 5 year old loves it and she carries it everywhere, so far we have kept the thin packaging lid, but I don't know how long that will last, and it only sets on. But my 3rd child just turned 5 and asked for crayons for her birthday and is in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Soderholm

customer_reviews.title: Crayola is #1
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Crayola products for the children in my family, and have them on hand for when they come to visit. All kids like to draw, color and paint and Crayola offers high quality products for all. Crayola is the best!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly certain this is the only way I want to purchase crayons from now on. The yellow plastic container is SUPER sturdy. It lasted through the "kids table" at our wedding and now our son uses it on a daily basis. It's nice that it keeps the crayons upright and they're easily accessible. There is no cover for these crayons, so if you wanted to store them somewhere where other things may be placed on or against them, prepare yourself for some extra colorful marks. We have them on a shelf in our sons art corner. I would recommend these to everyone and have contemplated getting them as presents!
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Best Crayola Set Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Crayola set to use on quilts and they work great! THIS is the set I always wanted in school but they weren't available back then. LOVE that there is a sharpener that actually works!! Once I color the fabric, I press it with a hot iron and paper towel and it sets the color so it doesn't wash out.
customer_reviews.author: TXCowgirrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant since there was a lot of negative reviews about the crayons being used or broken but ours was in a box and none of the crayons were out or broken. Love the glitter and metallic ones. Lots of options and the carrier is great!
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Oh the love of crayons
customer_reviews.text: As a kid who did not love receiving a box of fresh crayola crayons. I surely did. Even as an adult I love coloring with my crayons. Great box with a carrier and sharpener. Love the large selection of colors. Oh the joy of being a kid again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Stallworth

customer_reviews.title: This Was a Hit!!!
customer_reviews.text: They Loved it-was a surprise with some other items. “Best Day Ever!” Is what they reported. So I’m pleased with the items including this that were shipped to them. Ages 5 and 3.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Great collection (tip included in review).
customer_reviews.text: Serious Crayola collection for serious coloring! Love the built-in sharpener! The plastic cradle makes it so easy to carry. Here's a handy tip When your crayons wear down to where they are below the case making it hard to get them out, just put small cotton balls under them to raise them up again. Happy coloring!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice crayon caddy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the plastic caddy! It is sturdy and won't fall apart like the cardboard boxes when used by the yoounger kids. As for the crayons, what can I say... Crayola is THE brand to by for crayons. If at any time after this review I change my opinion of this item, I will return to this item and edit my review to reflect my new findings. I promise you that I will do my best to describe the items to the best of my ability to give you an informed decision before your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is typically expected with the Crayola brand. Instead, these crayons are very waxy, as in what you would expect with cheaper brands. Very disappointing. I wonder if they are the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color choices on this crayon set.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product numerous times. I love the look of it in our homeschool classroom. The carrying handle is convenient. Our system is thus: The older kids use the new crayons for concentrated, detailed artwork. When the crayons begin to get worn, the K-2 crowd uses then for their "stay in the lines" artwork. By the time they are down to the paper or broken, I dump them into a bin for the preschooler. Check out camelcamelcamel.com for amazon price watch alerts to grab this and other items at cheap prices.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Slot of colors
customer_reviews.text: Gave them as a gift with a big coloring book to a 6yr old for Christmas, she loves to color. Loves how many different colors you get, comes with a 🖍 sharper. Just wish it had come with a container to keep all them in that would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: nina houstom

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves coloring!! Brought this winderful crayon collection and couple pages with us on our road trip, just kept this little guy busy and turned out those colorful pages :) the quality is much much better than the one that restaurants provided. It’s worth the money and 152 different colors is way too enough.
customer_reviews.author: Chiaying Yen

customer_reviews.title: Crayons are awesome but the container they came in is really cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Is crayons are pretty cool and I love how they have almost every color you could think of. But the container that they came in is very cheap and when I went to open them of course I spilled the Crayons everywhere. I ended up taping one side to make it like a lid. Won't be keeping it in the container 4 long probably a box will be better. But it does come with a crayon sharpener
customer_reviews.author: Aritha D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, terrible packing by Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great and packaged well by Crayola. HOWEVER, Amazon’s packing definitely left something to be desired. There was no cushioning material in this box at all. The box of crayons was turned upside down on top of everything else in the box so the majority of the crayons had spilled out. The carrying caddy and variety of colors is very nice. But again the packing by Amazon was terrible!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Chojnacki

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Whenever the crayons finally break or get worn down. I just buy a 24 count box of crayola crayons and refill the empty spots. I change it up too, sometimes I grab the glitter crayons or gel crayons. It's perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PreciousCargo4

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love these?
customer_reviews.text: How can anybody write anything but 5 stars for Crayola crayons? I mean, it's crayons! My kids love them! And when they are all broken up we melt them into a big, round, mixed colors crayon. A fun project for the kids to see. The colors are so pretty too. Makes me wanna be a kid again!
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Crayola Ultimate Crayon Collection Coloring Set, Kids Indoor Activities At Home, Gift Age 3+ - 152 Count, Standard, Model Number: 52-0030, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Size:StandardProudly display your Crayola crayons with the Crayola Ultimate Crayon Collection Coloring Set! This multi-tiered, four-sided Crayola crayon case let's you organize and find crayons easily. As one of the biggest Crayola Crayon boxes we have, there are 152 crayons included. With a crayon sharpener and a portable caddy, keeping these crayons for kids ready to use whenever and wherever you want is a breeze. Inspire creativity with a huge selection of colors, including metallic and glitter crayons. These non-toxic crayons are the ideal coloring supplies for kids ages 3 and older.
feature_bullets: BULK CRAYOLA CRAYONS: One Crayola Ultimate Crayon Collection Coloring Set with 152 crayons, 1 crayon sharpener, and 1 portable caddy
STRONG & DURABLE: These art tools for kids are double wrapped for added durability and strength
CRAYOLA CRAYONS: Choose from 152 different colors, including metallic and glitter crayons
GREAT FOR TRAVEL: Create art anywhere with a portable caddy that brings ease to finding the right color
SAFE & NONTOXIC: These non-toxic art tools make a great gift set for kids ages 4 & up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars6,081 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
